nodded. "I understand. I cannot go with you, but we need to
> know what and=
 why the Dinobots are acting so strangely."
>

shoulder and pulled off what looked to be

e that was similar to the Autobot but a

mlock, but if there is anything

hance."

<NEW>

WHEELIE took it, and then quietly said, "But what do we=
 do if he is right?  If he was treated as you feared he might?  What can we=
 do if his anger holds sway?  And his hatred is justified against all in ou=
r way?  What if he is under no pressure?  That he simply hates all and want=
s to go through them like a thresher?"

What Wheelie feared..  What if the =
Dinobots truly had gone to hate all, even their allies, for how they had be=
en treated?  What would they do then?  He could not fight his old friends. =
 He wasn't sure how he would respond then.  Or what Rodimus would do either=
.

He nodded quietly, "I will go, and here you stay.  Be safe, and when rea=
dy go away.  Find the rest, and let them know.  For until then, take care w=
e both shall go."
